# Antonio Almeida

> Product Designer and Developer based in Australia. Eleven years of client delivery, from design through production.

My work starts with figuring out what to build. I've been building products solo with AI â€” shipping, breaking things, realising the hard decisions happen before the code.

## Site structure

- [Home](https://www.antoniodesign.work/): Overview of work, background, and writing.
- [Projects](https://www.antoniodesign.work/project/): Selected client and product work.
- [Articles](https://www.antoniodesign.work/articles/): Writing on design, product, and building with AI.

## Background

Currently Lead Designer & Developer at Emptyhead Digital, delivering end-to-end for major Australian organisations. Previously Senior UX Designer at WORK180, Lead Designer & Developer at ACMN, and Digital Designer at The Sydney Morning Herald.
